response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to us at $1,000,000, but considering its importance to you, I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial arrangement.

To make this offer more appealing, I am extending it to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a substantial discount, allowing you to secure such a valuable asset at a fraction of its market value.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
